text: Wayne Larrivee is an American sportscaster. He is the voice of the Green Bay Packers. He has done play by play duties for the Big Ten Network, VERSUS, Westwood One/Dial Global, Chicago Bears, Chicago Bulls, Chicago Cubs, Kansas City Kings, Iowa Hawkeyes football, Missouri Tigers men's basketball, and ESPN Plus. During a practice round of the 2012 Women's Golf US Open in Kohler, Wisconsin, he asked a fan that what club should be used because a golf ball was in the rough. A fan told him an iron or a wood. Larrivee then said, "You got that narrowed down." Then the fan said, "You rock like Bob Uecker." title: Wayne Larrivee
